problems.title: Check Palindrome String (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given a string S (without spaces), check if it is a palindrome using recursion. A palindrome reads the same forwards and backwards.

Input Format:
A single string S.

Output Format:
Print "YES" if S is a palindrome, otherwise "NO".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
madam

Sample Output
YES

Sample Input
hello

Sample Output
NO
hintsList: Compare characters at l and r. If they differ, return false. Otherwise, recurse on (l+1, r-1) until l >= r.
